root.name: HammerLock Wrestling
root.description: OverviewThis game features fictional professional wrestlers performing movesets similar to real pro wrestlers like Hulk Hogan and Lex Luger.Gameplay Modes:Exhibition: Up to four players compete in singles or tag team matches.Top Ranking Match: Players face 11 other wrestlers to become the champion.Tournament: A tournament of up to 8 players to determine a champion.Round Robin Tournament: Up to six players compete in a round robin to determine a champion.
